resources.string: To reset your password, please enter your email address

NHS provide two different helpline for the patient, 111 service is free telephone service which a team of fully trained advisers there to assist you 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. \n\n 999 is an emergency number and only ring this number if you or the patient you ringing for is seeking for urgent care.

This app is mainly designed for the intention of providing the end user with the full services that NHS provides to their patients.\n\n This involves in giving the ability for the patient to find a service that is close by to them (e.g. finding nearest eye clinic in a radius of 5 miles from a given postcode) and other useful features.
